scripts.local-r: tsc && sam local invoke -t template.local.yaml -e events/event-reverse.json "ReverseFunction"
scripts.local-r-debug: tsc && sam local invoke -t template.local.yaml -e events/event-reverse.json -d 5858 "ReverseFunction"
scripts.local-tz: tsc && sam local invoke -t template.local.yaml -e events/event-timezone.json "GetTimezoneFunction"
scripts.local-tz-debug: tsc && sam local invoke -t template.local.yaml -e events/event-timezone.json -d 5858 "GetTimezoneFunction"
scripts.build: del-cli dist dist.zip dependencies && tsc && copy-node-modules . dist && copy-node-modules . dependencies/nodejs && cpy package.json dependencies/nodejs && cd dependencies && bestzip ../nodejs.zip nodejs && cd .. && cpy template.yaml --rename template.local.yaml . && replace nodejs.zip dependencies --silent template.local.yaml
scripts.package: npm run build && sam package --template-file template.yaml --s3-bucket camp-aws-sample-bucket --output-template-file template.packaged.yaml
scripts.deploy: sam deploy --template-file template.packaged.yaml --stack-name camp-aws-sample --region us-east-2 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides ProjectName=camp-aws-sample --no-fail-on-empty-changeset
scripts.package-deploy: npm run package && npm run deploy
